name: Amrita Ranjan
tagline: English graduate with experience in content creation, event coordination, and digital marketing.
summary: Results-driven English graduate with hands-on experience in content creation, journalism, event coordination, and digital marketing. Skilled in SEO writing, strategic communication, stakeholder management, and campaign support using WordPress and CRM tools. Seeking roles in content strategy, PR, or digital media to deliver creative and analytical impact.
highlights: Worked with Times Internet (Economic Times) as Event Coordinator.
Delivered 1500+ high-quality mathematics questions as Subject Matter Expert.
Handled live doubt-solving sessions for 130+ SSC aspirants.
Managed sponsor and partner relationships for large-scale events.
Conducted market research and competitor analysis for marketing campaigns.
Recognized internally for content accuracy and quality.
Experience across EdTech, Media, and Marketing domains.

projects.name: SEO Content Portfolio
projects.description: Created SEO-optimized articles and educational content for EdTech and media platforms.
projects.impact: Improved content visibility, engagement, and search rankings.

projects.name: Event Sponsorship Database Management
projects.description: Managed sponsor, vendor, and attendee databases for corporate events.
projects.impact: Ensured seamless coordination and improved partner communication.

experience.summary: Researched and evaluated 100+ potential sponsors, managed relationships with 20+ partners, and maintained structured databases for sponsors, vendors, and attendees to ensure smooth event execution.
Conducted market research and competitor analysis, supported lead generation and outreach initiatives, and collaborated with cross-functional teams across multiple marketing channels.
Delivered 1500+ high-quality mathematics questions, conducted live doubt-solving sessions for SSC aspirants, and was recognized for content accuracy and consistency.
Developed 500+ mathematics questions for competitive examinations and received internal recognition for subject expertise.

education.school: Dyal Singh College, University of Delhi
